presentation.description: IDSync is a low-cost extensible identity management solution that enables companies to manage user identity information and line-of-business software access and privileges in one location, Microsoft Active Directory, a familiar tool in everyday use. It provides secure two-way synchronization of User Data and application or service permissions and settings as well as full synchronization of Contacts, Distribution Lists, and more. In addition to identity synchronization between Active Directory and Parallels, the Self-Service Portal features of IDSync reduces IT support costs and employee down time by permitting users to manage their own personal identity data and a perform resets of their password and other identity information.

setting.name: Parallels Operations OpenAPI URL
setting.description: This value is the URL of the POA/PA OpenAPI address. (Example: http://www.apsdemo.org:8440/rpc2)

setting.name: Parallels Billing OpenAPI URL
setting.description: This value is the URL of the PBA/Billing OpenAPI address. (Example: https://pba.apsdemo.org:5224/rpc2)

setting.name: Reseller Company Name
setting.description: Reseller Comany name. Case and space sensitive.
setting.error-message: Must provide reseller company name for provisioning client licenses.

setting.name: Reseller License
setting.description: The license key that was provided to you after aquiring the license to the Identity Syncronizer software.

setting.name: IDSync AD Tab Label
setting.description: This will appear as a prefix on the client's AD tab. We recommend you use your company name, this field is provided for scenarios where the customer name provided for the license has changed, or is stylized in way not supported. If unsure, leave blank. (Default: "Parallels")
setting.error-message: The AD Tab Label field is required.

setting.name: Plugin Name
setting.description: The name of the IDSync plugin to licesnse. If unsure, leave blank. (Default 'Syncronizer.Target.Parallels')

setting.name: IDSync Licensing Web-Service
setting.description: Leave Blank if unsure. The URL address of the IDSync License Web Service. (Default: http://licensing.identitysyncronizer.com/service.asmx?wsdl)

setting.name: Gateway URL
setting.description: The URL of the Gateway Agent. Format: http(s)://HOST:PORT/

setting.name: Automatic Licensing Gateway URL
setting.description: Leave blank if unsure. This serves as an override for the licesning gateway URL.

setting.name: Gateway User Name
setting.error-message: The gateway user name is required to provision your IDSync license. This information will be required when configuring IDSync. We recommend the user name be your company name. This field is case and space sensitive.

setting.name: Password
setting.description: This field will be required when configuring IDSync.
setting.error-message: The Gateway password is required to provision your account.

setting.name: Customer Name
setting.description: This field is filled during provisioning, however if you wish to use something different than your company name, or if you're a personal account type, please fill this in. The customer name is what defines you as an entity in our license records. You will need this value to when installing the IDSync client. It is case and space sensitive.
setting.error-message: Customer name is required to create your license.

setting.name: Customer License
setting.description: Leave blank. This value should be filled in after provisioning and is required when configuring IDSync.

setting.name: Customer/Account ID
setting.description: Leave blank, will be auto-filled during the provisioning processs. The Customer or Account ID.
